net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Type_Basic
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Expression Types wouldn't usually add the basic type because it's inferred for all RollExpressions.
If a RollExpression should not have the basic type, it's considered "unrollable" and likewise
should have the type dnd5e_Type_unrollable.

The basic roller has a priority of 50. Rollers that should act on the roll before the basic
roll happens should have a lower priority value (happens earlier) while those that should
act afterwards have a higher priority value (happens later).
